description: Describe the content of a hub.

parameters.name: HubName
parameters.description: The name of the hub that contains the content to describe.

parameters.name: HubContentType
parameters.description: The type of content in the hub.

parameters.name: HubContentName
parameters.description: The name of the content to describe.

nested_items.name: HubContentName
nested_items.description: The name of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentType
nested_items.description: The type of hub content.

nested_items.name: DocumentSchemaVersion
nested_items.description: The document schema version for the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubName
nested_items.description: The name of the hub that contains the content.

nested_items.name: HubArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hub that contains the content.

nested_items.name: HubContentDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentMarkdown
nested_items.description: A string that provides a description of the hub content. This string can include links, tables, and standard markdown formating.

nested_items.name: HubContentDocument
nested_items.description: The hub content document that describes information about the hub content such as type, associated containers, scripts, and more.

nested_items.name: SageMakerPublicHubContentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the public hub content.

nested_items.name: ReferenceMinVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum version of the hub content.

nested_items.name: SupportStatus
nested_items.description: The support status of the hub content.

nested_items.name: HubContentSearchKeywords
nested_items.description: The searchable keywords for the hub content.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: HubContentDependencies
nested_items.description: The location of any dependencies that the hub content has, such as scripts, model artifacts, datasets, or notebooks.

nested_items.name: DependencyOriginPath
nested_items.description: The hub content dependency origin path.

nested_items.name: DependencyCopyPath
nested_items.description: The hub content dependency copy path.

nested_items.name: HubContentStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the hub content.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The failure reason if importing hub content failed.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that hub content was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time of the hub content.
